      • reIndexRecord

        public static boolean reIndexRecord(java.lang.String pi,
                                    java.lang.String recordType,
                                    OverviewPage overviewPage)
                             throws DAOException
        Writes the record into the hotfolder for re-indexing. Modules can contribute data for re-indexing. Execution of method can take a while, so if performance is of importance, use triggerReIndexRecord instead.
        Parameters:
        pi -
        recordType -
        overviewPage -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DAOException

      • loadFulltext

        public static java.lang.String loadFulltext(java.lang.String pi,
                                            java.lang.String dataRepository,
                                            java.lang.String altoFilePath,
                                            java.lang.String fulltextFilePath,
                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                     throws AccessDeniedException,
                                            java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                            java.io.IOException,
                                            IndexUnreachableException,
                                            DAOException
        Loads full-text via the REST service. ALTO is preferred, with a plain text fallback.
        Parameters:
        pi -
        dataRepository -
        altoFilePath - ALTO file path relative to the repository root (e.g. "alto/PPN123/00000001.xml")
        fulltextFilePath - plain full-text file path relative to the repository root (e.g. "fulltext/PPN123/00000001.xml")
        request -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        AccessDeniedException
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        DAOException
        IndexUnreachableException

      • findFirstMatch

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> findFirstMatch(java.lang.String text,
                                                                  java.lang.String regex,
                                                                  int group)
        Finds the first String matching a regex within another string and return it as an Optional
        Parameters:
        text - The String in which to search
        regex - The regex to search for
        Returns:
        An optional containing the first String within the text matched by regex, or an empty optional if no match was found

        Returns:
